name: Clues
description:
Clues is a game that takes place a regular day when our protagonist gets home from work.

The game is told through text in a third person adventure game, and the goal is to uncover the aweful truth that may be hidden just beneath the surface. Through this medium we are able to show the emotions of the protagonist as the mystery proceeds. As well as giving the players the best graphic card they can use. Their imagination.

Is it obvious?
